application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Whitebeam (Sorbus aria)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1m, to tidy and contain. Crown clean through removal of weak, crossing and damaged branches. Final height 3m and spread 1.5mT2 - Whitebeam (Sorbus aria)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1m, to tidy and contain. Crown clean through removal of weak, crossing and damaged branches. Final height 3m and spread 1.5mT3 - Whitebeam (Sorbus aria)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1m, to tidy and contain. Crown clean through removal of weak, crossing and damaged branches. Final height 3m and spread 1.5mG1 - Fruit Tree Group x8 Trees	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the trees by up to 1.5m, to tidy and contain. Crown clean through removal of weak, crossing and damaged branches. Reduce the larger trees by more to try and make the group of trees as uniform as possible. Lightly reduced the smaller suppressed trees to encourage growth. Attach ratchet straps to 2x leaning trees to try and correct their form, ratchet straps to be fitted above head height and to the Laurel opposite, tighten ratchet until trees are straight. Final height 3m and spread 1.5m
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree GROUP labelled G1
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
